title: CG Claire /Triplett Volume.... PC Version...
content:
I have ONLY found a Macintosh version of this… Any Ideas of where to find PC Version? Monotype said they only had a mac version….

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/font_3846.jpg)
author: amiart

comments.content:
That’s the supplier, so they ought to know, but you could always use font conversion software, such as [FontLab’s TransType](http://web.archive.org/web/20070315103949/http:/www.fontlab.com/index.php), to create a PC version once you have the mac version.

- Mike Yanega
